run_exp[source]

run_exp(task:"Which exeriment task to run", lr:"Learning rate", bs:"Batch size", sl:"Seqlence length", n_epochs:"Number of epochs", train_sz:"TwinSequence train size", valid_sz:"TwinSequence valid size", n_hashes:"Number of LSH Attention hashes", bucket_size:"LSH Attention bucket size", vocab_sz:"Vocab size", d_model:"Model dimension", n_layers:"Number of model layers", n_heads:"Number of attention heads", max_seq_len:"Max sequence length for model embedding", causal:"Use causal masking", use_lsh:"Use LSH Attention", save_model:"Save model locally in /models", do_wandb_logging:"Use wandb logging", wandb_name:"wandb run name", wandb_group:"wandb group", wandb_notes:"wandb notes", wandb_tags:"wandb tags", cuda_id:"Which cuda device to use")

tasks: synthetic, lm, translation
